                                                # æ ˆ Stack

                                                æ ˆæ˜¯ä¸€ç§éµå¾ªåè¿›å…ˆå‡ºï¼ˆLIFOï¼ŒLast In First Outï¼‰çš„çº¿æ€§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚å°†å…ƒç´ æ·»åŠ åˆ°æ ˆé¡¶ç§°ä¸º â€œå…¥æ ˆâ€ï¼Œç§»é™¤æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ç§°ä¸º â€œå‡ºæ ˆâ€ã€‚æ ˆå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ â€œæ•°ç»„â€ æˆ– â€œé“¾è¡¨â€ æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œç„¶è€Œæ•°ç»„å’Œé“¾è¡¨å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä»»æ„ä½ç½®æ·»åŠ æˆ–åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ ˆéµå¾ªåè¿›å…ˆå‡ºï¼ˆæˆ–å…ˆè¿›åå‡ºï¼‰çš„åŸåˆ™ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ ˆå¯ä»¥è§†ä¸ºä¸€ç§å—é™çš„æ•°ç»„æˆ–é“¾è¡¨ã€‚

                                                ä½¿ç”¨æ•°ç»„å®ç°æ ˆï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†æ•°ç»„çš„å°¾éƒ¨ä½œä¸ºæ ˆé¡¶ã€‚å…¥æ ˆå°±æ˜¯å‘æ•°ç»„å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå‡ºæ ˆå°±æ˜¯åˆ é™¤æ•°ç»„å°¾éƒ¨çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚

                                                class Stack<T> {
  private readonly stack: T[]
  
  constructor(stack: T[] = []) {
    this.stack = stack
  }
  
  /**
   * è·å–æ ˆçš„å€¼
   */
  get value() {
    return this.stack
  }
  
  /**
   * è·å–æ ˆçš„é•¿åº¦
   */
  get size() {
    return this.stack.length
  }
  
  /**
   * åˆ¤æ–­æ ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
   */
  isEmpty() {
    return this.stack.length === 0
  }
  
  /**
   * å…¥æ ˆï¼ˆå‘æ ˆé¡¶æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ï¼‰
   * @param value - å…¥æ ˆçš„å…ƒç´ 
   */
  push(value: T) {
    this.stack.push(value)
  }
  
  /**
   * å‡ºæ ˆï¼ˆç§»é™¤æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼‰
   */
  pop() {
    return this.stack.pop()
  }
  
  /**
   * è®¿é—®æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ 
   */
  peek() {
    return this.stack[this.stack.length - 1]
  }
  
  /**
   * éå†æ ˆ
   */
  each(callback: (value: T, index: number) => void) {
    for (let i = 0; i < this.stack.length; i++) {
      callback(this.stack[i], i)
    }
  }
}

                                                # é˜Ÿåˆ— Queue

                                                é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯ä¸€ç§éµå¾ªå…ˆè¿›å…ˆå‡ºï¼ˆFIFOï¼ŒFirst In First Outï¼‰çš„çº¿æ€§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚å‘é˜Ÿå°¾æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ç§°ä¸º â€œå…¥é˜Ÿâ€ï¼Œç§»é™¤é˜Ÿé¦–å…ƒç´ ç§°ä¸º â€œå‡ºé˜Ÿâ€ã€‚é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ â€œæ•°ç»„â€ æˆ– â€œé“¾è¡¨â€ æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è§†ä¸ºä¸€ç§å—é™çš„æ•°ç»„æˆ–é“¾è¡¨ã€‚

                                                ä½¿ç”¨æ•°ç»„å®ç°æ ˆï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†æ•°ç»„çš„å°¾éƒ¨ä½œä¸ºæ ˆé¡¶ã€‚å…¥æ ˆå°±æ˜¯å‘æ•°ç»„å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå‡ºæ ˆå°±æ˜¯åˆ é™¤æ•°ç»„å°¾éƒ¨çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚

                                                class Queue<T> {
  private readonly queue: T[]
  
  constructor(queue: T[] = []) {
    this.queue = queue
  }
  
  /**
   * è·å–é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å€¼
   */
  get value() {
    return this.queue
  }
  
  /**
   * è·å–é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„é•¿åº¦
   */
  get size() {
    return this.queue.length
  }
  
  /**
   * åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
   */
  isEmpty() {
    return this.queue.length === 0
  }
  
  /**
   * å…¥é˜Ÿï¼ˆå‘é˜Ÿå°¾æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ï¼‰
   * @param value - å…¥é˜Ÿçš„å…ƒç´ 
   */
  enqueue(value: T) {
    this.queue.push(value)
  }
  
  /**
   * å‡ºé˜Ÿï¼ˆç§»é™¤é˜Ÿé¦–å…ƒç´ ï¼‰
   */
  dequeue() {
    return this.queue.shift()
  }
  
  /**
   * è®¿é—®é˜Ÿé¦–å…ƒç´ 
   */
  front() {
    return this.queue[0]
  }
  
  /**
   * éå†é˜Ÿåˆ—
   */
  each(callback: (value: T, index: number) => void) {
    for (let i = 0; i < this.queue.length; i++) {
      callback(this.queue[i], i)
    }
  }
}

                                                # ä¼˜å…ˆçº§é˜Ÿåˆ—

                                                ä¼˜å…ˆçº§é˜Ÿåˆ—åœ¨æ’å…¥æ“ä½œæ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ¯”è¾ƒå…ƒç´ çš„ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯å…ˆè¿›å…ˆå‡ºï¼Œå…¶ä»–æ“ä½œä¸æ™®é€šé˜Ÿåˆ—ç›¸åŒã€‚

                                                class QueueNode<T> {
  value: T
  priority: number
  
  constructor(value: T, priority: number) {
    this.value = value
    this.priority = priority
  }
}

class PriorityQueue<T> extends Queue<QueueNode<T>> {
  constructor() {
    super()
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æ’å…¥å…ƒç´ 
   * @param node - æ’å…¥çš„å…ƒç´ 
   */
  enqueue(node: QueueNode<T>) {
    const { value, priority } = node
    const queueNode = new QueueNode(value, priority)
    
    if (this.value.length === 0) {
      this.value.push(queueNode)
    }
    else {
      // æ ‡è®°èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä¼˜å…ˆçº§æ˜¯å¦æœ€ä½
      let lowest = true
      for (let i = 0; i < this.value.length; i++) {
        if (queueNode.priority < this.value[i].priority) {
          this.value.splice(i, 0, queueNode)
          // ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ä¸æ˜¯æœ€ä½
          lowest = false
          break
        }
      }
      if (lowest) {
        // ä¼˜å…ˆçº§æœ€ä½ï¼Œæ’å…¥åˆ°æœ€å
        this.value.push(queueNode)
      }
    }
  }
}

                                                # æ•°ç»„ Array List

                                                æ•°ç»„æ˜¯ä¸€ç§çº¿æ€§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ã€‚æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ è¢«å­˜å‚¨åœ¨è¿ç»­çš„å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ•°ç»„å†…å­˜åœ°å€ï¼ˆé¦–å…ƒç´ å†…å­˜åœ°å€ï¼‰å’Œç´¢å¼•å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—å‡ºå…ƒç´ çš„å†…å­˜åœ°å€ã€‚ç´¢å¼•æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šæ˜¯å†…å­˜åœ°å€çš„åç§»é‡ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´é€šè¿‡ç´¢å¼•å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ•°ç»„è®¿é—®å…ƒç´ çš„æ•ˆç‡éå¸¸é«˜ã€‚

                                                æ•°ç»„çš„ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼š

                                                • æ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤æ•ˆç‡ä½ï¼šå½“æ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ è¾ƒå¤šæ—¶ï¼Œæ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œéœ€è¦ç§»åŠ¨å¤§é‡å…ƒç´ ã€‚

                                                • å¦‚æœæ’å…¥å…ƒç´ åè¶…å‡ºæ•°ç»„é•¿åº¦èŒƒå›´ï¼Œä¼šé€ æˆå…ƒç´ ä¸¢å¤±ï¼›è€Œåˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ ä¼šé€ æˆéƒ¨åˆ†å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´æµªè´¹ã€‚

                                                • æ•°ç»„çš„é•¿åº¦æ˜¯ä¸å¯å˜çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¦æ‰©å®¹æ•°ç»„ï¼Œéœ€è¦å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´å¤§çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼ŒæŠŠåŸæ•°ç»„å…ƒç´ ä¾æ¬¡å¤åˆ¶åˆ°æ–°æ•°ç»„ã€‚

                                                • æ•°ç»„çš„å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´æ˜¯è¿ç»­çš„ï¼Œå½“æ•°ç»„è¾ƒå¤§æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœç©ºé—´ç¢ç‰‡è¾ƒå¤šï¼Œå†…å­˜å¯èƒ½æ— æ³•æä¾›è¶³å¤Ÿå¤§çš„è¿ç»­ç©ºé—´ã€‚

  }

                                                # é“¾è¡¨ Linked List

                                                é“¾è¡¨æ˜¯ä¸€ç§çº¿æ€§æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œé“¾è¡¨çš„æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå„èŠ‚ç‚¹é€šè¿‡ â€œæŒ‡é’ˆâ€ è¿æ¥ï¼ŒæŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å†…å­˜åœ°å€ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æŒ‡é’ˆå¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚åœ¨é“¾è¡¨ä¸­æ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹éå¸¸æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æ”¹å˜æŒ‡é’ˆçš„æŒ‡å‘å³å¯ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é“¾è¡¨æ’å…¥ä¸åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ çš„æ•ˆç‡éå¸¸é«˜ã€‚é“¾è¡¨çš„å…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹è¢«åˆ†æ•£å­˜å‚¨åœ¨å†…å­˜ç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬çš„å†…å­˜åœ°å€æ— é¡»è¿ç»­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸ç”¨æ‹…å¿ƒç©ºé—´ç¢ç‰‡çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

                                                é“¾è¡¨çš„ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼š

                                                • è®¿é—®æ•ˆç‡ä½ï¼šé“¾è¡¨éœ€è¦ä»å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå‘åéå†ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰¾åˆ°ç›®æ ‡èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

                                                • å ç”¨å†…å­˜å¤§ï¼šé“¾è¡¨é™¤äº†éœ€è¦å­˜å‚¨èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ï¼Œè¿˜è¦å­˜å‚¨èŠ‚ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆã€‚å¦‚æœèŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®è¶Šå¤šï¼ŒæŒ‡é’ˆçš„å†…å­˜å½±å“å°±è¶Šå°ã€‚

                                                class LinkedNode<T> {
  next: LinkedNode<T> | null
  value: T
  
  constructor(value: T) {
    this.value = value
    this.next = null
  }
}

class LinkedList<T> {
  head: LinkedNode<T> | null
  length: number
  
  constructor() {
    this.head = null
    this.length = 0
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param value - æ·»åŠ çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  append(value: T) {
    const node = new LinkedNode(value)
    if (!this.head) {
      this.head = node
    }
    else {
      let current = this.head
      while (current.next) {
        current = current.next
      }
      current.next = node
    }
    this.length++
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é“¾è¡¨æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param value - æ’å…¥çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  insert(index: number, value: T) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.length) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    const node = new LinkedNode(value)
    if (index === 0) {
      node.next = this.head
      this.head = node
    }
    else {
      let current = this.head
      let previous: LinkedNode<T> | null = null
      for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
        previous = current
        current = current!.next
      }
      previous!.next = node
      node.next = current
    }
    this.length++
  }
  
  /**
   * æŸ¥æ‰¾å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  find(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.length) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    let current = this.head
    for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
      current = current!.next
    }
    return current
  }
  
  /**
   * ä¿®æ”¹å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param value - ä¿®æ”¹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  update(index: number, value: T) {
    const node = this.find(index)
    node!.value = value
  }
  
  /**
   * ç§»é™¤å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  remove(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.length) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    let current = this.head
    let previous: LinkedNode<T> | null = null
    if (index === 0) {
      this.head = current!.next
      current = null
    }
    else {
      for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
        previous = current
        current = current!.next
      }
      previous!.next = current!.next
      current = null
    }
    this.length--
  }
  
  /**
   * éå†é“¾è¡¨
   */
  each(callback: (value: T, index: number) => void) {
    let current = this.head
    let index = 0
    callback(current!.value, index++)
    while (current!.next) {
      current = current!.next
      callback(current.value, index++)
    }
  }
}

                                                # åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨

                                                åŒå‘é“¾è¡¨æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æŒ‡å‘ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹å’Œä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚

                                                class DoubleLinkedListNode<T> {
  value: T
  prev: DoubleLinkedListNode<T> | null
  next: DoubleLinkedListNode<T> | null
  
  constructor(value: T) {
    this.value = value
    this.prev = null
    this.next = null
  }
}

class DoubleLinkedList<T> {
  head: DoubleLinkedListNode<T> | null
  tail: DoubleLinkedListNode<T> | null
  length: number
  
  constructor() {
    this.head = null
    this.tail = null
    this.length = 0
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é“¾è¡¨å°¾éƒ¨æ·»åŠ èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param value - æ·»åŠ çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  append(value: T) {
    const node = new DoubleLinkedListNode(value)
    if (!this.head) {
      this.head = node
      this.tail = node
    }
    else {
      this.tail!.next = node
      node.prev = this.tail
      this.tail = node
    }
    this.length++
  }
  
  /**
   * å‘é“¾è¡¨æŒ‡å®šä½ç½®æ’å…¥èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param value - æ’å…¥çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  insert(index: number, value: T) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.length) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    const node = new DoubleLinkedListNode(value)
    if (this.length === 0) {
      this.head = node
      this.tail = node
    }
    else {
      if (index === 0) {
        this.head!.prev = node
        node.next = this.head
        this.head = node
      }
      else if (index === this.length) {
        this.tail!.next = node
        node.prev = this.tail
        this.tail = node
      }
      else {
        let current = this.head
        for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
          current = current!.next
        }
        node.prev = current!.prev
        node.next = current
        current!.prev!.next = node
        current!.prev = node
      }
    }
    this.length++
  }
  
  /**
   * æŸ¥æ‰¾å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  find(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index > this.length) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    // ä»å‰å¾€å
    if (this.length / 2 > index) {
      let current = this.head
      for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
        current = current!.next
      }
      return current
    }
    // ä»åå¾€å‰
    else {
      let current = this.tail
      for (let i = this.length - 1; i > index; i--) {
        current = current!.prev
      }
      return current
    }
  }
  
  /**
   * ä¿®æ”¹å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   * @param value - ä¿®æ”¹çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
   */
  update(index: number, value: T) {
    const node = this.find(index)
    node!.value = value
  }
  
  /**
   * ç§»é™¤å¯¹åº”ç´¢å¼•çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹
   * @param index - ç´¢å¼•å€¼
   */
  remove(index: number) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.length) throw new Error("out of range")
    
    let current = this.head
    if (this.length === 1) {
      this.head = null
      this.tail = null
    }
    else {
      if (index === 0) {
        this.head!.next!.prev = null
        this.head = this.head!.next
      }
      else if (index === this.length - 1) {
        current = this.tail
        this.tail!.prev!.next = null
        this.tail = this.tail!.prev
      }
      else {
        for (let i = 0; i < index; i++) {
          current = current!.next
        }
        current!.prev!.next = current!.next
        current!.next!.prev = current!.prev
      }
    }
    this.length--
    return current!.value
  }
  
  /**
   * éå†é“¾è¡¨
   */
  each(callback: (value: T, index: number) => void) {
    let current = this.head
    let index = 0
    callback(current!.value, index++)
    while (current!.next) {
      current = current!.next
      callback(current.value, index++)
    }
  }
}

                                                # å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ Hash Map

                                                # å“ˆå¸Œå†²çª

                                                # å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨ç†è®º

                                                # è‡ªå®šä¹‰å“ˆå¸Œè¡¨

                                                # æ ‘ Tree

                                                # äºŒå‰æ ‘

                                                # å¹³è¡¡æ ‘

                                                # çº¢é»‘æ ‘

                                                # å›¾ Graph

                                                # å›¾çš„è¡¨ç¤º

                                                # è‡ªå®šä¹‰å›¾

                                                # å›¾çš„éå†

                                                # æŸ¥æ‰¾ç®—æ³•

                                                # äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾

                                                # æ’åºç®—æ³•

                                                # å†’æ³¡æ’åº

                                                ArrayList.prototype.bubbleSort = function () {
  let flag = true
  for (let i = 0; i < this.value.length - 1; i++) {
    for (let j = 1; j < this.value.length - i; j++) {
      if (this.value[j - 1] > this.value[j]) {
        [this.value[j - 1], this.value[j]] = [this.value[j], this.value[j - 1]]
        flag = false
      }
    }
    if (flag) break
  }
}
